laboratory_examinations.findings: Mild atelectasis at the right lung base; minimal signal drop off on out-of-phase imaging suggesting mild fatty deposition in the liver; 6 mm enhancing lesion in the right hepatic lobe; stones and sludge filling the gallbladder with slight edema of gallbladder wall; very mild fat stranding anterior to the pancreas; pancreatic duct not dilated, no stones in pancreatic duct; kidneys enhancing and excreting contrast symmetrically.
